name: postgresql
title: SELECT Query
content:
SELECT
  u.id,
  u.name,
  u.email,
  COUNT(o.id) as order_count
FROM users u
LEFT JOIN orders o ON o.user_id = u.id
WHERE u.is_active = true
  AND u.created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '30 days'
GROUP BY u.id, u.name, u.email
HAVING COUNT(o.id) > 0
ORDER BY order_count DESC
LIMIT 100;
